thread.title: Volkswagen Emissions Scandal Puts European Rivals on Offensive
thread.title_full: Volkswagen Emissions Scandal Puts European Rivals on Offensive - WSJ

author: Jason Chow
title: Volkswagen Emissions Scandal Puts European Rivals on Offensive
text:
PARISâ€”The U.S. emissions scandal engulfing Volkswagen AG has put European rivals on the offensive, as they scramble to show their own diesel engines meet standards in Europe.
A growing backlash against diesel-powered vehicles could spell an end to the long love affair with the fuel in Europe, the region where diesel is most widely adopted and...
